meanings.definition: The work or skill of a stonemason.
meanings.sent1: Learning stonemasonries requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the stonemasonries in the cathedral is breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The stonemasonries in the old castle were so expertly crafted that they seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to mastering stonemasonries was as solid as the stones she worked with.
meanings.sent5: The stonemasonries of the ancient ruins stood as a testament to the craftsmanship of the past.

meanings.definition: The structures or buildings created by stonemasons.
meanings.sent1: The stonemasonries of the castle walls were sturdy and imposing.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the intricate stonemasonries of the historic buildings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children played hide-and-seek among the stonemasonries of the garden walls.
meanings.sent4: The stonemasonries of the city square echoed with the footsteps of passersby.
meanings.sent5: The stonemasonries of the bridge arched gracefully over the river, a symbol of unity and strength.
